name: blocklist_de-feed
label: Blocklist.de Feed
description: Blocklist.de is a free and voluntary service provided by a Fraud/Abuse-specialist, whose servers are often attacked via SSH-, Mail-Login-, FTP-, Webserver- and other services. This connector facilitates automated operations related to fetching the list of blocklisted IP addresses of services.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Server URL of the Blocklist.de Feed Security server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Fetch Indicators
operations.description: Fetched IPs added after the time specified as "Added After". Defaults to the IPs added in the last 48 hours.

parameters.title: Added After
parameters.name: time
parameters.tooltip: To get only the last added IP-Addresses. Default: last 48 hours
parameters.description: Specify time to get only the last added IP-Addresses. Supported Service Types are: SSH, Mail, Apache, IMAP, FTP, Bots and VOIP. Default last 48 hours IPs reported.

parameters.title: Service Type
parameters.name: service
parameters.description: Select Blocklist.de service type to fetch specific service block listed IPs. You can choose between SSH, Mail, Apache, IMAP, FTP, Bots, and VOIP.

parameters.title: Process Response As
parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being create as Feed records in FortiSOAR or returned in the JSON format (Return as a JSON).
parameters.description: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being create as Feed records in FortiSOAR or returned in the JSON format (Return as a JSON).

operations.title: Fetch All Blocklist IPs
operations.description: Fetch list of IPs having run attacks on the service from the Blocklist.de.

parameters.title: Service Type
parameters.name: service
parameters.description: Select Blocklist.de service type to fetch specific service block listed IPs. You can choose between All, SSH, Mail, Apache, IMAP, FTP, SIP, IRC Bot, Bots, Strong IPs and Brute Force Login. By default, this is set to Bots.

parameters.title: Process Response As
parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being create as Feed records in FortiSOAR or returned in the JSON format (Return as a JSON).
parameters.description: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being create as Feed records in FortiSOAR or returned in the JSON format (Return as a JSON).
